scripts.ca: watchman watch-del-all && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native run-android
scripts.car: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native run-android --variant=release && npm run log
scripts.init: npm i && cd ios && pod install && open PUapp.xcworkspace && cd .. && code .
scripts.clean: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i && cd ios && rm -rf Pods Podfile.lock PUapp.xcworkspace main.jsbundle && touch main.jsbundle && pod install && open PUapp.xcworkspace && cd ..
scripts.cleanrepo: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i && cd ios && rm -rf Pods Podfile.lock PUapp.xcworkspace main.jsbundle && touch main.jsbundle && pod repo update && pod install && open PUapp.xcworkspace && cd ..
scripts.cleanrepow: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i && cd ios && rm -rf Pods Podfile.lock PUapp.xcworkspace main.jsbundle && touch main.jsbundle && pod repo update && pod install && cd ..
scripts.cleanar: npm run cleanrepow && npm run ar
scripts.bundle: cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew bundleRelease && cd .. && npx react-native run-android --variant=release
scripts.debug-build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.rb: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/*
scripts.rbr: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/
scripts.ar: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && npm run car
scripts.arc: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && npm run ca
